definition: Guangning county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: The "Guangdong green" jade deposit is situated in Wuzhishan area, Ningxian county, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: “廣東綠”玉石礦牀發育於廣東省廣寧縣五指山地區。
